Class BankOperations

java.lang.Object
com.banksystem.BankOperations
public class BankOperations extends Object
Manages all banking operations and coordinates between users and the system. This class simplifying the interface between the UI and the business logic of the banking system.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BankOperations(Map<String,Customer> customers, TransactionLog logger)
    Initializes bank operations with customer data and transaction logging.

  • Constructor Details

    • BankOperations

      public BankOperations(Map<String,Customer> customers, TransactionLog logger)
      Initializes bank operations with customer data and transaction logging. Sets up bank manager and necessary components.
      Parameters:
      customers - map of customer names to Customer objects
      logger - transaction logging system

  • Method Details

    • handleCustomer

      public void handleCustomer()
      Handles customer login and verification for the banking system. Includes password setup for first-time users.

    • handleBankManager

      public void handleBankManager()
      Handles bank manager operations. Creates bank manager menu with full system access.

    • updateCustomer

      public void updateCustomer(Customer customer)
      Updates customer data in the system. Used after creating new customers or updating existing ones.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer to update

    • getBankManager

      public BankManager getBankManager()
      Gets the current bank manager instance.
      Returns:
      the bank manager

    • getCustomers

      public Map<String,Customer> getCustomers()
      Gets the map of all customers in the system.
      Returns:
      map of customer names to Customer objects
